item.title: Your Simple Guide to use ChatGPT via the OpenAI API
item.description: ChatGPT is a state-of-the-art language model developed by OpenAI. It serves many purposes in natural language processing, including language translation, chatbots, and story writing, among others. This guide describes how to utilize ChatGPT through the OpenAI API service on macOS operating systems. Additionally, it provides instructions for interacting with ChatGPT using Python. Connect to ChatGPT via API To set up ChatGPT API follow these instructions: Set up an API Key Sign up to OpenAI and follow the indications to create a new secret key.
